abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.

reauth_confirm.description: Aladdin Connect needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

integration_removed.description:
The Aladdin Connect integration has been removed from Home Assistant.

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) integration entries from your Home Assistant setup. [Click here to see your existing Aladdin Connect integration entries]({entries}).
integration_removed.title: The Aladdin Connect integration has been removed
